oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Burn. Mrs. D.T. Kimbrough letter to Mrs. J.L. Burn. P. 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. D.T. Kimbrough (Caroline G.) letter, Nashville, TN, to Mrs. J.L. Burn, Niota, TN. Aug. 20, 1920. On Tennessee Woman Suffrage Association letterhead. P. 2 of 3. Expresses gratitude for son Harry's vote for ratification.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: women's suffrage, letters,
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mrs. D.T. Kimbrough (Caroline G.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
